DOC.brief_summary: This study compare pharmacokinetics characteristic single oral intake import PROBUCOL tablet ( Lorelco ) ( 1*250mg/tablet ) market PROBUCOL tablet ( Chang Tai ) ( 1*250mg/tablet ) healthy male volunteer demonstrate bioequivalent .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Single Oral Intake Imported PROBUCOL Tablet ( Lorelco ) With Marketed PROBUCOL Tablet ( Chang Tai ) Chinese Healthy Volunteers
